title: Most Wide-Open Grand Tour in Memory? Five Riders Hunt Red Jersey in Wild Vuelta GC Battle
content:
After Sunday's climbing chaos, it's still impossible to say who will win the Vuelta and who will step onto the final podium September 8 in Madrid.

Read the full article at Most Wide-Open Grand Tour in Memory? Five Riders Hunt Red Jersey in Wild Vuelta GC Battle on Velo.
author: ahood
